title.narrative: STAR-Ghana (Strengthening Transparency Accountability & Responsiveness in Ghana)

description.narrative: A 5-year DFID service contract, the STAR-Ghana Programme is seeking to increase the effectiveness of citizen influencing change that advances democracy and social inclusion through civil society organisations. Catalysing the efforts of citizens and CSOs, it aims to bring change in policies and practices at the national and local level and enhance the responsiveness of state and non-state duty bearers. At the same time, it is building an independent national entity (the STAR Ghana Foundation).

mailing-address.narrative: Christian Aid, 35-41 Lower Marsh, London SE1 7RL, United Kingdom
